name: rag-agent-proxy
description: Прокси-сервер для добавления параметра provider в запросы Roo Code Nightly

scripts.dev:emulator: pnpm run clean && pnpm run env:emulator && node start-emulator.js && concurrently "pnpm run server" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run admin" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run frontend" "wait-on tcp:8082 && pnpm run android" --names "SERVER,ADMIN,METRO,ANDROID" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,green"
scripts.dev:usb: pnpm run clean && pnpm run env:usb && node adb-reverse.js && concurrently "pnpm run server" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run admin" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run frontend:clean" "wait-on tcp:8082 && pnpm run device" --names "SERVER,ADMIN,METRO,ANDROID" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,green"
scripts.android:bundle: cd frontend && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.dev:ios: pnpm run clean && pnpm run env:ios && node start-ios.js && concurrently "pnpm run server" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run admin" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run frontend" "wait-on tcp:8082 && pnpm run ios" --names "SERVER,ADMIN,METRO,IOS" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,green"
scripts.build:release: pnpm run android:setup && pnpm run android:bundle && pnpm run android:build && pnpm run android:copy
